description:
A loyal and dangerous knight that serves under Lord Alwine and does his bidding. He has a scar under his right eye, which is hidden by his long hair, from a very short fight with Robin in the first episode.

During a fight with Robin he is blown off a cliff by the forces of nature along with Marion, but he uses his strength to help Robin save her, and ends up falling, believing to have died. It is discovered later that he survived the fall. He later becomes a knight for King Richard, and no longer serves under Lord Alwine.
name: Gilbert
